ygData.subject: Re: Runed totem staffs...buying them
ygData.msgSnippet: I just bought one for (23plat + a pair of magic woven gloves).  I ve been in Paw but didn t get near the High Shaman who carries the staves. A high shaman
ygData.messageBody:
I just bought one for (23plat + a pair of magic woven gloves). I've
been in Paw but didn't get near the High Shaman who carries the staves.
A high shaman rooted me so be aware they will do that.

I've heard it's easier to get a staff from the group just south of the
karana zone in the rathe mountains. Don't stay there at night though
unless you can handle undead gnolls I've heard.

Azara
Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: mark Prescott [mailto:prescotm@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 12:45 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Runed totem staffs...buying them


From: "mark Prescott" <prescotm@...>

there a better place to buy them...where t will be cheaper..?
thanks for the advice in advance , it will prolly help a lot of people
when
